"If I wished you reformatted I would have done so while you were in the CR
chamber." Veratis replied looking through some notes that scanned across one
of his stations. He understood Grizzltrons suspicions and hoped logic would
prevail. "If I would have forced you to reformat you surely would hold
malice towards me. I only wish for peace, and learning."
----- Original Message -----
From: <hugar_twriker@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 22, 2001 11:46 AM
Subject: Re: old but still strong.

Reformat me when I am asleep?"  Grizzltron said.

variety
